This email serves as notice in accordance with the Sub-Contract Agreement that Brad Seatwood of Multiplex, has identified the need for action to be taken in order to rectify or adequately complete the works in question.

Actions:

* the subcontractor must address the issue within 7 months of the date of this notification. Where Multiplex has communicated the necessity for the sub-contractor to submit a proposal for testing and rectification prior to undertaking any further works, either within the body of this notification or via separate notification, the proposal must be submitted within the same timeframe.

Should further information be required in order to do so effectively by the nominated deadline, please reply to this email to respond to the person who has identified the actions required or contact the person directly.

A report containing this issue will be logged and distributed via Aconex as a follow up which does not change the deadline to address the required actions nominated above. However, the status of actions or response to the identified issue should be provided through Aconex
